ProjectTitle: AUtonomous Demanufacturing of batteRy driven products (AUDRI)
InitialFeedbackHistory:
10/04/2024
Sharing: to share data underlying your publications it may be easier to to use a data repository e.g. KU Leuven RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr), here your dataset will get a DIO that you can refer to in your publication; and it automatically registered in Lirias so it appears on your publication list. You mention under sharing restrictions, would intellectual property rights be restriction in your project? For more information on data sharing see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing;
label: good with suggestions
